ğŸ¨ Creative Works & Communication

I enjoy visual storytelling, content design, and creating materials that make ideas easier and more engaging to understand. During my undergraduate years, I actively participated in design, writing, and media production for multiple student organizations.

  • Contributed to the Sichuan University Overseas Study College WeChat official account, including article writing, layout design, and content planning.
  • Operated and designed content for the RoboMaster team WeChat official account, including promotional posters, team updates, and short videos.
  • Designed posters, event banners, and visual assets for student organizations, including robotics lectures, lab open days, competitions, and community events.
  • Participated in event planning and creative direction for technical talks, outreach activities, and recruitment events.
  • Won First Place in the Resume Design Competition at Sichuan University, recognized for aesthetics, clarity, and creative layout.

These experiences shaped my interest in combining engineering with design, and strengthened my ability to communicate complex ideas through visual and narrative storytelling.
